# omitted

**Type Property**

A time style with no time-related components represented.

## Declaration

```swift
static let omitted: Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle
```

## Discussion

If both the date style and time style are set to `omitted`, the time is represented using the default style of `shortened`.

## Modifying a Time Style

- **complete**: A time style with all components represented.
- **shortened**: A shortened time style with only the hour, minute, and day period components represented.
- **standard**: A time style with all components except the time zone represented.
